content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. We can help you with plumbing, electrical, and HVAC needs. May I have your name, please?
Thank you, George. Could you provide your address so we can check if you’re in our service area?
Sure, it's 7899 Mountain Highway, Rolling Pines.
Thanks! What electrical issue do you need help with?
I've got flickering lights in a couple of rooms, and a breaker keeps tripping.
Thank you for letting us know, George. When would be the best time for us to send an electrician to help you?
Tomorrow around 10 AM would work if you have something available.
Thank you! Let me quickly check our calendar for availability at 10 AM tomorrow.

I’m having trouble accessing our scheduling system right now. I’m going to ask a team member to help complete your booking. Someone from XYZ Home Services will reach out to you soon. Thank you for your patience!
reason: Agent encountered a system error while checking availability and has escalated to a human operator.
